data.title: Song: This Christmas written by Donny Hathaway, Nadine McKinnor
data.meta_description: The song This Christmas was written by Donny Hathaway and Nadine McKinnor and was first released by Donny Hathaway in 1970. It was covered by Maysa featuring Will Downing, Dave Barnes, Dave Koz featuring Eric Benet, The Idea of North and other artists.
